EMAIL.description: Email intelligence and quality scoring for digital engagement optimization
EMAIL.semantic_context: Email deliverability and engagement optimization layer enabling high-performance digital campaigns
EMAIL.marketing_use: Foundation for email campaign targeting, deliverability optimization, and digital engagement strategies

EMAILQUALITYLEVEL.marketing_meaning: Primary filter for email campaign targeting and deliverability optimization - determines send priority and expected engagement rates

creative_potential.8-10: Premium email targeting - high engagement probability, low bounce risk, priority send candidates
creative_potential.6-7: Standard targeting - reliable delivery with good engagement, core audience segment
creative_potential.4-5: Broad reach targeting - higher volume campaigns, moderate engagement expectations
creative_potential.1-3: Risky targeting - use for suppression lists or re-verification campaigns only

EMAILQUALITYLEVEL.combination_signals: Essential qualifier for all email-based campaigns and digital engagement strategies - multiplies effectiveness of demographic and behavioral targeting

EMAILOPTIN.marketing_meaning: Compliance foundation and engagement willingness indicator for all email marketing activities
EMAILOPTIN.creative_potential: Explicit permission signals higher engagement potential, brand affinity, and receptiveness to marketing communications
EMAILOPTIN.combination_signals: Required for compliant email marketing, enhances trust and engagement across all digital strategies

DOMAIN.marketing_meaning: B2B vs B2C targeting signal and communication approach indicator

creative_potential.corporate_domains: Professional targeting - business hours, LinkedIn integration, formal tone, decision-maker messaging
creative_potential.ISP_domains: Consumer targeting - personal hours, social channels, casual tone, lifestyle-focused
creative_potential.custom_domains: Small business owners - entrepreneurial mindset, decision makers, growth-focused messaging

DOMAIN.combination_signals: Key signal for B2B/B2C segmentation and communication strategy optimization across all channels

PII.description: Core demographic and geographic consumer data including names, addresses, age, gender, and census-based location attributes
PII.semantic_context: Primary identity and geographic foundation for deterministic identity resolution
PII.marketing_use: Identity linking, geographic targeting, and basic demographic segmentation

STATE.marketing_meaning: Geographic foundation for regional campaigns, cultural adaptation, and regulatory compliance
STATE.creative_potential: State-level cultural context enabling regional messaging, local partnerships, seasonal campaigns, and compliance-aware targeting
STATE.combination_signals: Geographic foundation that modifies all demographic and behavioral targeting with regional context

ZIP.marketing_meaning: Precision geographic targeting enabling neighborhood-level campaigns and socioeconomic inference
ZIP.creative_potential: ZIP-level targeting for local businesses, socioeconomic lifestyle inference, hyper-local campaigns, and community-specific messaging
ZIP.combination_signals: Micro-geographic enhancer that adds precision to all demographic and behavioral segments

CENSUS_BLOCK_GROUP.marketing_meaning: Ultra-precise geographic targeting for neighborhood-level campaign optimization and demographic concentration analysis
CENSUS_BLOCK_GROUP.creative_potential: Block-group targeting enables hyper-local campaigns, demographic concentration optimization, and neighborhood lifestyle targeting
CENSUS_BLOCK_GROUP.combination_signals: Ultra-precise geographic qualifier that maximizes targeting efficiency for high-concentration demographic segments

URBANICITY_CODE.marketing_meaning: Urban vs suburban vs rural lifestyle targeting foundation

creative_potential.U: Urban - convenience-focused, diverse, public transportation, apartment living, cultural access
creative_potential.S: Suburban - family-focused, community-oriented, car-dependent, single family homes, local shopping
creative_potential.R: Rural - self-reliant, outdoor lifestyle, traditional values, distance challenges, local community

URBANICITY_CODE.combination_signals: Lifestyle density context that enhances all geographic and demographic targeting strategies

DATA.description: Comprehensive consumer intelligence profiles including financial attributes, lifestyle preferences, purchase history, and demographic segmentation for advanced audience targeting
DATA.semantic_context: Primary behavioral and demographic intelligence layer for sophisticated audience segmentation
DATA.marketing_use: Advanced audience segmentation, persona development, and precision behavioral targeting

AGE.marketing_meaning: Age-based targeting foundation determining message tone, channel preference, and life stage relevance

creative_potential.18-25: Digital natives - authenticity-focused, cause-driven, mobile-first, experimental with brands
creative_potential.26-40: Peak earning millennials - efficiency-focused, experience-driven, family-building, brand-conscious
creative_potential.41-57: Wealth-building Gen X - stability-focused, family-centered, quality-conscious, value-driven
creative_potential.58+: Established boomers - service-focused, brand-loyal, traditional channels, security-minded

AGE.combination_signals: Foundational demographic that enhances all behavioral and geographic targeting with generational context

GENDER.marketing_meaning: Core demographic filter for gender-relevant product positioning and communication approach
GENDER.creative_potential: Gender-informed targeting enabling relevant product emphasis and communication styles while avoiding stereotypical assumptions
GENDER.combination_signals: Modifies messaging tone and product emphasis across all demographic and behavioral segments

ADDRESS_TYPE.marketing_meaning: Address stability and residence type indicator for lifestyle-based targeting and delivery optimization

creative_potential.H: Home addresses - family-focused messaging, stability, residential services targeting
creative_potential.P: PO Box addresses - privacy-conscious, rural/mobile populations, alternative delivery needs
creative_potential.R: Rural addresses - outdoor lifestyle, self-reliance, community-focused values
creative_potential.S: Seasonal addresses - affluent mobility, vacation home owners, seasonal targeting opportunities

ADDRESS_TYPE.combination_signals: Lifestyle stability signal that enhances geographic and demographic targeting precision

HASPHONE.marketing_meaning: Phone contact availability enabling multi-channel campaigns and high-touch engagement strategies
HASPHONE.creative_potential: Phone availability signals engagement readiness, enables voice campaigns, SMS marketing, and high-value prospect identification
HASPHONE.combination_signals: Multi-channel enabler that enhances all digital targeting with voice and SMS capabilities

HASEMAIL.marketing_meaning: Email contact availability enabling digital campaign targeting and automated engagement workflows
HASEMAIL.creative_potential: Email availability enables digital nurture campaigns, automated sequences, and cost-effective scale targeting
HASEMAIL.combination_signals: Digital engagement foundation that enables all email-based targeting and automation strategies

MARITAL_STATUS.marketing_meaning: Core household composition signal enabling family-oriented targeting and relationship-based messaging strategies

creative_potential.Married: Joint decision-making households - family-focused messaging, dual-income positioning, shared experience marketing, relationship-oriented products, household-level targeting
creative_potential.Single: Individual decision-makers - personal independence messaging, self-focused benefits, individual lifestyle targeting, flexible scheduling, self-care positioning

MARITAL_STATUS.combination_signals: Household structure foundation that modifies all targeting with relationship context, decision-making dynamics, and family-oriented vs individual-focused messaging

valid_values: 1. Millennials and Gen Z (1982 and after)
GENERATION.marketing_meaning: Generational targeting for values-based messaging and channel optimization

creative_potential.Generation X: Pragmatic, family-focused, balanced digital adoption, value-conscious
creative_potential.Baby Boomers: Service-oriented, brand loyal, traditional communication, quality-focused
creative_potential.Post-WWII: Traditional values, established preferences, relationship-focused, security-minded

GENERATION.combination_signals: Generational layer that enhances all demographic and behavioral targeting with values context

INCOME_HH.marketing_meaning: Detailed income-based targeting for product price point alignment and premium vs value messaging strategies

creative_potential.U-T ($700K+): Ultra-premium targeting - luxury everything, exclusive experiences, concierge services
creative_potential.P-S ($250K-$699K): Premium targeting - luxury goods, high-end services, time-saving solutions
creative_potential.K-O ($100K-$199K): Upper-middle targeting - selective premium, quality-focused, aspirational luxury
creative_potential.F-H ($50K-$99K): Middle-class targeting - value-conscious premium, practical benefits, ROI-focused
creative_potential.A-E (Under $50K): Value targeting - affordability, utility, budget-conscious, promotional focus

INCOME_HH.combination_signals: Economic foundation that determines product positioning and pricing strategy across all audience segments

NET_WORTH_HH.marketing_meaning: Wealth-based targeting for investment services, luxury positioning, and financial security messaging

creative_potential.I-J ($250K+): Wealth management - investment services, estate planning, luxury lifestyle
creative_potential.G-H ($50K-$249K): Wealth building - financial planning, investment growth, security focus
creative_potential.E-F ($10K-$49K): Stability seeking - emergency funds, basic investments, financial education
creative_potential.B-D (Under $10K): Financial assistance - debt management, basic banking, financial literacy

NET_WORTH_HH.combination_signals: Wealth signal that elevates targeting across all premium categories and financial services

EDUCATION.marketing_meaning: Education-based messaging complexity and professional targeting foundation

creative_potential.Doctorate/PhD: Expert targeting - complex solutions, professional services, thought leadership
creative_potential.Graduate School: Professional targeting - advanced services, expertise-based messaging, career focus
creative_potential.Completed College: Educated consumer - detailed information, quality-focused, career-oriented
creative_potential.Some College/Vocational: Practical targeting - hands-on solutions, skill-based, value-focused
creative_potential.High School: Straightforward messaging - clear benefits, practical applications, accessible language

EDUCATION.combination_signals: Communication sophistication layer that determines messaging complexity across all targeting

business_context.description: Enterprise identity management platform for deterministic identity resolution and customer intelligence. Enables brands to identify and contextually engage consumers across all channels and devices through a proprietary identity graph, supporting identity resolution, data enrichment, customer profiling, audience activation, and measurement attribution in both cookied and cookieless environments.
unique_value_propositions: Proprietary lifestyle clustering that goes beyond standard demographics
Cross-channel identity resolution for unified customer view across touchpoints
Behavioral intent signals for predictive targeting and engagement optimization
Premium data quality scoring for campaign performance optimization
Semantic field intelligence enabling AI-driven creative audience discovery
business_context.targeting_philosophy: Combine demographic foundations with behavioral signals and lifestyle context to create sophisticated audience strategies that balance reach, relevance, and revenue potential. Layer contact quality, purchase behavior, and engagement signals to maximize campaign performance and ROI.

optimization_rules: Always qualify email campaigns with EMAILQUALITYLEVEL >= 6 for optimal deliverability
Combine GENDER + AGE + GENERATION + income signals for comprehensive demographic foundation
Layer luxury/technology/travel purchase behavior for premium audience identification
Use ZIP + URBANICITY_CODE + DWELLING_TYPE for precision geographic and housing targeting
Prioritize HASPHONE + HASEMAIL contacts for multi-channel campaign opportunities
Filter by recent purchase activity (within 24 months) for behavioral targeting accuracy
Combine ADDRESS_TYPE + STATE + ZIP for sophisticated geographic segmentation
Use lifestyle purchase signals (health, outdoor, fashion) for interest-based targeting
Layer OWNS_INVESTMENTS + NET_WORTH_HH for sophisticated wealth targeting
Combine MARRIED + CHILDREN_HH + child age segments for family lifecycle targeting
Use OCCUPATION_CATEGORY + EDUCATION for professional and communication sophistication targeting
strategic_combinations: Premium Audience: EMAILQUALITYLEVEL >= 8 + RECENT_LUXURY_PURCHASES > 3 + INCOME_HH IN ('K. $100,000-$149,999', 'L. $150,000-$174,999', ...)
Tech Innovators: RECENT_TECHNOLOGY_PURCHASES > 5 + AGE 26-40 + EMAILQUALITYLEVEL >= 7 + EDUCATION = 'Completed College'
Affluent Families: MARRIED = 1 + CHILDREN_HH > 0 + INCOME_HH IN ('H. $75,000-$99,999', 'K. $100,000-$149,999', ...) + DWELLING_TYPE = 'Single Family'
Investment Prospects: OWNS_INVESTMENTS = 1 + OWNS_STOCKS_AND_BONDS = 1 + NET_WORTH_HH IN ('H. $100,000 - $249,999', 'I. $250,000 - $499,999', 'J. Greater than $499,999')
Multi-Channel Ready: HASPHONE = 1 + HASEMAIL = 1 + EMAILQUALITYLEVEL >= 6 + PREMIUM_CARD presence
Young Families: MARRIED = 1 + CHILD_AGED_0_3_HH > 0 + INCOME_HH IN ('F. $50,000-$59,999', 'G. $60,000-$74,999', ...)
Teen Parents: CHILD_AGED_13_18_HH > 0 + INCOME_HH IN ('G. $60,000-$74,999', 'H. $75,000-$99,999', ...) + EDUCATION = 'Completed College'
Luxury Lifestyle: RECENT_LUXURY_PURCHASES > 3 + RECENT_GOURMET_PURCHASES > 2 + DWELLING_TYPE = 'Single Family'
Pet Enthusiasts: RECENT_PETS_PURCHASES > 3 + DWELLING_TYPE = 'Single Family' + CHILDREN_HH presence
Fashion Forward: RECENT_WOMENS_FASHION_PURCHASES > 4 + AGE 25-45 + INCOME_HH IN ('F. $50,000-$59,999', 'G. $60,000-$74,999', ...)
Collectors Market: RECENT_COLLECTIBLES_PURCHASES > 2 + AGE 35+ + NET_WORTH_HH IN ('G. $50,000 - $99,999', 'H. $100,000 - $249,999', ...)
Professional Women: GENDER = 'Female' + OCCUPATION_CATEGORY IN ('Professional', 'Upper Management') + RECENT_WOMENS_FASHION_PURCHASES > 2
Credit Growth: NEW_CREDIT_OFFERED_HH IN ('E. $1,001 - $3,000', 'F. $3,001 - $5,000', ...) + CREDIT_CARD = 1 + AGE 25-40
